    maxItems := flag.Int64("m", 10, "The maximum number of access keys to show")
    userName := flag.String("u", "", "The name of the user")
    flag.Parse()

    if *userName == "" {
        fmt.Println("You must supply the name of a user (-u USER)")
        return
    }

    if *maxItems < int64(0) {
        *maxItems = int64(10)
    }
